products.title: Harper Gold
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure harper gold deluxe roman blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality deluxe roman blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
Min width: 300mm max width: 1350mm (with join 2500mm)
 	min drop: 400mm max drop: 2500mm
 	fabric composition: 62% polyester 38% cotton
 	guarantee: 12 months
 	controls: sidewinder control.
 	Fabric lining: ivory poly cotton lining as standard, white blackout lining and interlining available.
 	Fixings: fixing brackets included.
 	Headrail: robust aluminium headrail, 30mm wide x 43mm deep.
 	Finish: fabric attached to headrail with velcro.
